text: Tijmen van Loon (born 20 March 2001) is a Dutch track cyclist. Van Loon represents the Netherlands at international tournaments. Van Loon became European Champion in the under-23 sprint event at the 2022 UEC European Track Championships (under-23 & junior). He competed at the 2022 UEC European Track Championships in the men's sprint event where he was eliminated in the quarter finals. Van Loon studies studying political at the Radboud University Nijmegen. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch cyclists Category:Sportspeople from North Holland Category:People from Amstelveen
title: Tijmen van Loon
